Articles.Content:
Hey all 1st post. Discovered KSP on my last deployment and man...this game....

Anyhow I just recently discovered BD armory and WOW what an amazing mod. Using contract packs I've fought a war on Kerbin and out to Minmus and was thinking,

"How awesome would it be to have a mod that takes a few basic ship designs with guns and randomly spawn them while you are out in space doing your thing and attack you etc etc?" Maybe taking out an enemy ship would produce some funds or maybe in the aftermath you could send an engineer out to salvage parts or something? Hell, KAS the wreckage and tow is back to Kerbin lol.

I have no modding ability whatsoever. So here is my request.

Thanks for your time!
Interesting, could be done with a modification of the Contract Configurator plugin perhaps?

I don't know quite how you could do this, but I suppose if you could get it to trigger, like the speed records or something, so there is a chance for them to trigger when you pass certian areas then It could be possible...I think?

Hm, reminds me of an idea I had to combine BD Armory and Kerbinside... instead of buying the new bases, you fly there and fight the current occupant via BD Armory for control.

Or, my other idea of "hostile colonization" where you send a colony ship to a certain planet, where there are enemy fighters in orbit that you have to kill to be safe.
something like a war mode, with random vessels spawning everywhere would be cool
